code: import React from"react";function formatTime(seconds){var h=Math.floor(seconds/3600);var m=Math.floor(seconds%3600/60);var s=Math.round(seconds%60);return[h,m>9?m:h?'0'+m:m||'0',s>9?s:'0'+s].filter(Boolean).join(':');}var SliderTooltip=function SliderTooltip(value){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"time-tooltip"},value&&formatTime(value));};export default SliderTooltip;
